title: Neilson Powless Racing for Tour de France Redemption: ‘I Am Making Up for Lost Time’
content:
After a niggling knee injury saw Powless miss out on the spring classics, he's hoping for a return to the Tour de France to make up for lost time 'I missed out on a lot of opportunities.'

Read the full article at Neilson Powless Racing for Tour de France Redemption: ‘I Am Making Up for Lost Time’ on Velo.
author: ahood
